Posts.Content: A couple of days at the beach.. I'm jealous. I hope you have loads of fun! K
Posts.Title: I'm off..

Posts.Content: Congratulations Ladies, I too will be reaching my 5 year mark next month.  Once I had two years of Oncologist appointments and had good results I felt I could breath again!  I only have to live with the side effects of Tamoxifen.  Enjoying each day with family and friends! Bless you for sharing as we all need to give hope to those who are newly diagnosed and going thru treatments we have survived. Cheryl
Posts.Title: Five years ago today!
